mapper.update:
/*+ kr.co.abcmart.bo.vendor.repository.master.VdVendorWrhsDlvyAddressDao.update [기본 update 쿼리] [Generator] */
UPDATE vd_vendor_wrhs_dlvy_address
vndr_no = #{vndrNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
wrhs_dlvy_gbn_type = #{wrhsDlvyGbnType, jdbcType=CHAR},
wrhs_dlvy_name = #{wrhsDlvyName, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
post_code_text = #{postCodeText, jdbcType=CHAR},
post_addr_text = #{postAddrText, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dtl_addr_text = #{dtlAddrText, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tel_no_text = #{telNoText, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
logis_vndr_code = #{logisVndrCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rgster_no = #{rgsterNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rgst_dtm = #{rgstDtm, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
moder_no = #{moderNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mod_dtm = #{modDtm, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
WHERE vndr_no = #{vndrNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND wrhs_dlvy_gbn_type = #{wrhsDlvyGbnType, jdbcType=CHAR}
